Please download the latest Zip file from https://github.com/ngld/OverlayPlugin/releases/download/
Extract the "libs" folder as well as the OverlayPlugin.dll

The folder should look something like this (keep in mind files can change with updates in the future):

OverlayPlugin
|- libs
|  |- HtmlRenderer.dll
|  |- Markdig.Signed.dll
|  |- Newtonsoft.Json.dll
|  |- OverlayPlugin.Common.dll
|  |- OverlayPlugin.Core.dll
|  |- OverlayPlugin.Updater.dll
|  |- SharpCompress.dll
|  |- System.ValueTuple.dll
|  |- websocket-sharp.dll
|- dummy.txt
|- OverlayPlugin.dll
